welcome_benefits: Exclusive Travel & Shopping Vouchers Worth More than ₹13,000 (From Tata CliQ, EaseMyTrip, Uber, Croma)

Movie & Dining: ₹500 Off on the Second Movie Ticket Via BookMyShow
Rewards Rate: 4 RPs/₹100 Spent Abroad (~1%) and 2 RPs/₹100 Spent Domestically (~0.50%)
Reward Redemption: Redeem RPs for Cashback/Vouchers. 1 Reward Point = ₹0.25
Domestic Lounge Access: 4 Complimentary Domestic Lounge Visits Each Quarter
International Lounge Access: 2 Complimentary International Airport Lounge Access Each Year
Insurance Benefits: Air accident insurance (worth Rs 3 crores), Credit Shield Cover worth Rs 50,000 and other travel-related Insurance Covers.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Renewal Fee Waiver on Spending ₹6 Lakhs Annually
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% of Fuel Surcharge Waiver (Maximum ₹250 Per Billing Cycle)

product_details: Joining benefits worth more than Rs. 9,000.
You can earn up to 4 Reward Points for every Rs 100 you spend on international purchases and 2 Reward Points per Rs 100 you spend on domestic purchases.
1 Reward Point for every Rs. 100 you incur on insurance and utility categories.
Up to 20,000 bonus Reward Points every year under the Milestone Reward Program.
(Buy 1 Get 1 Free Offer) BOGO on movie tickets on BookMyShow.
Get complimentary lounge access within and outside India.
With the ICICI Sapphiro Credit Card, you can enjoy complimentary golf sessions up to four times a month at some of the finest golf courses worldwide.
